itResponsible.title: IT-responsible for ÆSIR
itResponsible.description: We are looking for a person to manage G Suite (Google Drive & Gmail), Facebook Workplace and facilitate our growth in the digital space.
requirements: Have knowledge with the requirements put on us by GDPR.
Are available to help our members when needed.

prResponsible.title: PR responsible
prResponsible.description: We are looking for a person to be responsible for our PR and help us with brand development.
requirements: Have some knowledge with graphical design.
Strive to be consistent with your writing.
shouldLike: To stay up to date with the goings on at ÆSIR.

electronics.title: Electronics engineers
electronics.description: We constantly need more people who have practical experience with electronics. You would work with both on-board systems intended for our Odin rocket as well as ground systems and eventually work with bigger projects.
requirements: Have some experience with programming intended for embedded systems.

mechanical.title: Construction engineers
mechanical.description: We need people who can make drawings and CAD files into real objects. You will have access to a workshop with all sorts of tools and machines, a literal rocket factory.
requirements: Have used a lathe or CNC router.
shouldLike: Making things out of thin air.

webDevelopers.title: Web developers
webDevelopers.description: We are looking for persons who have experience with modern web development or web design.
requirements: Have used Git and CI/CD workflows.
Have used ES6/2015 or newer and have experience with (P)react or similar, or:
shouldLike: Creating an informational first view of ÆSIR for potential members and sponsors.
